response.original_title: Soul Power: The Legend of the American Basketball Association
response.overview: Experience the ABA's nine-year rivalry with the NBA that changed basketball forever. From the 3-point shot to the Slam Dunk Contest, the ABA's innovations became game staples. Told by "Dr. J" Erving, Larry Brown, Bob Costas & other Hall of Famers.
response.title: Soul Power: The Legend of the American Basketball Association
